system.weapons:
Turret (Gunner), one of: Twin-Linked Multilasers or Twin-Linked Lascannon

Fixed (Driver): Front 2x Hunter-Killer Missiles: (350m; S/–/–; 3d10+6 X; Pen 6; Clip 1)

---

Twin-Linked Multilasers (150m; –/–/5; 2d10+10 E; Pen 2; Clip 400; Reload 2 Full; Reliable, Twin-Linked)

Twin-Linked Lascannon (300m; S/–/–; 5d10+10 E; Pen 10; Clip 30; Reload 2 Full; Proven [3], Twin-Linked)
system.specialRules:
Traits: Enhanced Motive Systems, Open-Topped, Rugged, Wheeled Vehicle

Special Rules: Treat as Tracked Vehicle for purposes of Tests involving Difficult Terrain and how much slower the vehicle gets when suffering critical damage. Ignore Penalties to Operate/Drive Tests that Wheeled Vehicles suffer when taking Motive System Damaged Condition.
system.traitsText:
Traits: Enhanced Motive Systems, Open-Topped, Rugged, Wheeled Vehicle
Special Rules: Treat as Tracked Vehicle for purposes of Tests involving Difficult Terrain and how much slower the vehicle gets when suffering critical damage. Ignore Penalties to Operate/Drive Tests that Wheeled Vehicles suffer when taking Motive System Damaged Condition.
